description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Network superintendents supervise school principals and help them get resources they need to successfully run their school. There are 3 elementary network superintendents and each is responsible for 16 to 19 elementary schools. There are about 50 elementary schools across Oakland.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
